source: 成人维护的有强大影响力的家庭关系中还有很多其他的关系都被忽视了，而且随着年龄变大，越会对亲密关系更关注。
target: Many strong and influential family relationships are preferentially maintained by adults over other types of relationships. Adults also tend to become more focused on intimacy as they get older.

target_errors.term: Many strong and influential family relationships are preferentially maintained by adults over other types of relationships

source: 本文对家庭和成人健康相关文献进行系统性研究，72篇筛选出的文章依次按照主题进行解码，找到这个领域内的主要核心主题。
target: This article conducted systematic research on literature related to family and adult health. The 72 selected articles were subsequently sorted by topic to classify the main themes in this field.

source: 研究结果支持在成人健康方面的研究中较少得到代表的家庭成员，而不仅仅是亲密伴侣。
target: The research findings benefit family members who are underrepresented in adult health studies, as opposed to strictly romantic partners.

target_errors.term: as opposed to strictly romantic partners

source: 系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。
target: A systematic approach to family and health research should capture the complex network in which family members are intertwined, including multiple family relationships as well as larger health care systems.

source: 但是，聚焦于成人家庭成员的家庭和健康相关研究很多都只关注亲密关系，也就是婚姻关系。
target: However, studies on family and health often focus on adult family members and only pay close attention to intimate relationships, namely marital ones.

source: 结果表明有六大主题，其包括：家庭关系质量，家庭结构，健康和保健方面的行为因素，心理身体调节因素，看护情况，和老年人健康。
target: The results showed six major themes, including the quality of family relationships, family structure, behavioral factors in health and healthcare, psychological and physical conditioning factors, nursing conditions, and geriatric health.

source: 信号通路中风险基因的构成可能可以解释酒精依赖风险基因协同的神经生物学作用。
target: The presence of risk genes in signaling pathways may explain the synergistic neurobiological role that risk genes play in alcohol dependence.

target_errors.term: the synergistic neurobiological role that risk genes play in alcohol dependence.

source: 识别酒精依赖的风险基因和风险基因通路。
target: Identification of risk genes and risk gene pathways involved in alcohol dependence.

target_errors.term: Identification of risk genes and risk gene pathways involved in alcohol dependence.

source: 在包括1409名欧裔美国人(European-American，EA)酒精依赖者和1518 名EA健康对照者的探索性样本人群中检测了近一百万个基因标志物。
target: Nearly 1 million genetic markers were identified in an exploratory sample of 1,409 European-American (EA) alcoholics and 1,518 EA healthy control samples.

source: 此外，将681名非裔美国人 (African-American, AA) 病例和508名AA健康受试者作为重测样本。
target: In addition, samples from 681 African-American (AA) subjects and 508 healthy AA subjects were retested.

target_errors.term: samples from 681 African-American (AA) subjects and 508 healthy AA subjects were retested.

source: 我们发现了几个与酒精依赖显著相关的可重复的全基因组风险基因和风险通路。
target: We identified several reproducible genome-wide risk genes and risk pathways that showed significant associations with alcohol dependence.

source: 在多重比较Bonferroni校正后，“细胞- 细胞外基质相互作用”通路(EA样本中 一些基因和生物信号传导过程可能与酒精依赖的风险相关，本研究的发现为此提供了新的证据。
target: After multiple comparisons of the Conferring Correction for the "cell-extracellular matrix interaction" pathway (some genes and biological signaling processes in EA samples may be associated with the risk of alcohol dependence), the study results provided new evidence.

target_errors.term: After multiple comparisons of the Conferring Correction for the "cell-extracellular matrix interaction" pathway
(some genes and biological signaling processes in EA samples may be associated with the risk of alcohol dependence), the study results provided new evidence.

source: 我们采用基因富集 (gene-set-rich) 分析方法对酒精依赖进行了基于通路的全基因组关联分析 (GWAS)。
target: We used gene-set-rich analysis to perform a pathway-based, genome-wide association study (GWAS) on alcohol dependence.

source: 李-佛美尼综合症是一种遗传性的疾病，大概一生中有90%的患癌几率，它要求家庭成员终身接受综合性癌症筛查。
target: Li-Fraumeni Syndrome is a genetic disorder. Patients with this disorder have a 90 percent chance of developing cancer in a lifetime, and affected individuals must undergo comprehensive cancer screening throughout life.

target_errors.term: Patients with this disorder have a 90 percent chance of developing cancer in a lifetime, and affected individuals must undergo comprehensive cancer screening throughout life.

source: 本文研究医疗保健对管理李-佛美尼综合症风险和治疗过程中所起的作用，这些风险和治疗均由家长，青少年和成年孩子们来承担着。
target: This paper examines the role of healthcare in managing the risk and treatment of Li-Fraumeni Syndrome borne by parents, adolescents, and adult children.

target_errors.term: This paper examines the role of healthcare in managing the risk and treatment of Li-Fraumeni Syndrome borne by parents, adolescents, and adult children.

source: 参与研究的家庭有23个，采用半结构化的访谈。
target: 23 families participated in the study, which collected responses from semi-structured interviews.

target_errors.term: 23 families participated in the study, which collected responses from semi-structured interviews.

source: 使用草根理论方法，我们针对访谈文稿进行了开放式和集中式解码。
target: Using a grassroots theoretical approach, we conducted an open and centralized analysis of interview transcripts.

source: 家庭成员描述了健康领袖的作用在家庭内如何实现的，还有孩子的成熟，某家庭成员的去世等因素，这些因素都决定了谁承担了什么角色，这些角色在一段时间范围内如何发生变化。
target: Family members described how the role of a health leader is fulfilled within the family, as well as other factors like the maturity of the child and the death of a family member which may affect who assumes what role, and the change in roles over time.

target_errors.term: member which may affect who assumes what role, and the change in roles over time.

source: 他们通常会表达集体性的共同责任，帮助亲戚理解LFS症和实施合适的癌症风险管理。
target: They often express a collective shared responsibility to help relatives understand LFS and implement appropriate cancer risk management.

source: 家庭成员通过陪同一起去就医来给与支持以及信息搜集的方式来实现他们的健康作用。
target: Family members realize healthy results by accompanying each other to medical care to provide support and gather information.

target_errors.term: accompanying each other to medical care to
Family members realize healthy results by accompanying each other to medical care to provide support and gather information.

source: 我们的研究结果提供了健康医疗供给方的看法，主要是关于LFS病人和他们的亲戚如何作出特殊的医疗决策和发挥照料者的角色，这些都深受LFS遗传性特性的影响，和这些角色如何随着时间而发生变化。
target: Using health care provider perspectives, our findings provide insights on how LFS patients and their relatives make special medical decisions and play caregiver roles, how these roles are heavily influenced by the hereditary properties of LFS, and how these roles will change over time.

target_errors.term: and their relatives make special medical decisions and play caregiver roles, how these roles are heavily influenced by the hereditary properties of LFS, and how these roles will change over time.

source: 那些可以适应家庭角色动态变化的供给方可以较好地实现亲戚的社会心理和医疗的需要，主要是通过尽力理解承受LFS影响的家庭系统的功能，促进家庭成员们彼此的支持。
target: Providers who can adapt to the changing dynamics of family roles are better able to meet the psychosocial and medical needs of family members, primarily by trying to understand the functionality of the family system affected by LFS and by facilitating support among family members.

source: 家庭的组成有2-5个家庭成员，每个家庭的较年轻一代人年龄跨度7-40岁。
target: There were two to five family members, with the younger generations of each family spanning from ages 7 to 40.

source: 健康领袖的作用是代际间的，提供了必要的支持给家庭，特别是在复杂的医疗保健方面的决定。
target: The role of health leaders is intergenerational, providing support necessary to families, especially when it comes to making complex health care decisions.

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one out of every five children are reported to experience some sort of mental health issues, including Disruptive Behavior Disorders (DBDs).

source: 在发达国家的高度贫困社区，针对DBDs的有效干预措施已经得到开发和测试。
target: Effective interventions for childhood DBDs have been developed and tested in impoverished communities in developed countries.

source: DBDs 可以持续到成年期，带来诸多不良后果。
target: Childhood DBDs can persist into adulthood, leading to many negative consequences.

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one out of every five children are reported to experience some sort of mental health issues, including Disruptive Behavior Disorders (DBDs).

source: 研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。
target: The research process involved the following steps: An initial gathering of principals and teachers was held to present the content of the study and the main concepts of the intervention. The Uganda team was organized to comprehensively learn the 4Rs and 2Ss related content at the initial stage. Community stakeholders were invited to actively participate and provide additional feedback on both the content and the cultural appropriateness of the interventions. The final revision of the instruction manual was produced. Children's drawings were then collected for use in editing manuals.

source: 研究结果还强调了让社区利益相关者参与调适修改过程的重要性。
target: The findings also underscore the importance of involving community stakeholders in the intervention modification or adaptation process.

source: 但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。
target: However, in most African countries like Uganda, such interventions are still rare.

source: 作为一项随机测试的部分内容，本文调查研究了乌干达的30所学校中表现出行为问题的青少年及其他们的照顾者。
target: As part of a randomized study, this paper examined adolescents in 30 schools in Uganda who exhibited behavioral problems, as well as their respective caregivers.

source: 本文描述了原有干预措施和调整后的干预方案在内容方面以及实施方法上的异同。
target: This article describes the similarities and differences between the original and adapted intervention program in terms of content and implementation methods.

source: 本项研究结果强调了家长的SOC的重要性,因为它有可能提高5至12岁儿童的情绪调节能力。
target: The results of this study highlight the impact of parent SOC on emotional regulation abilities of children aged 5 through 12.

source: 样本来自256位父母,其孩子年龄在5至12岁之间(儿童平均年龄= 8.36,SD = 2.03,男性54.7%;父母平均年龄= 34.49,SD = 6.20,女性59%)。
target: Participants of the study included 256 parents of 5- to 12-year-old children (child M age = 8.36, SD = 2.03, 54.7% male; parent M age = 34.49, SD = 6.20, 59% female).

source: 参与者被要求在起始阶段和12个月时填写在线问卷,以供收集有关人口统计学信息,育儿行为和儿童情绪调节能力方面的数据。
target: Participants were asked to complete two online questionnaires twelve months apart. Data on demographic information, parenting behavior, and children's emotional regulation ability was collected from their responses.

target_errors.term: Participants were asked to complete two online questionnaires twelve months apart.

source: 纵向性的结构方程模型(SEM)分析的结果表明,在基线测量的父母SOC预测了孩子12个月后测量到的在情绪调节方面的适应和调适不良的结果。
target: Results of the longitudinal structural equation modeling (SEM) analysis showed that parental SOC measured at baseline correlated to their child's mood regulation abilities as measured after 12 months.

source: 本研究旨在验证以下假设,即父母对孩童应对能力的培养(SOC)与孩子的情绪调节能力之间的关系是长期的。
target: This study examines the hypothesis that parent socialization of coping (SOC) exhibits a longitudinal relation with child emotional regulation abilities.

source: 更具体地说,父母的积极培养孩子应对策略方面的建议预测了孩子情绪调节方面的适应性,而父母缺乏对孩童应对能力的培养则预测了孩子在情绪调节方面的不良调适能力。
target: More specifically, parental engagement coping strategies correlated to reports of adaptive emotional regulation seen in their respective children, whereas parental disengagement coping strategies correlated to reports of maladaptive emotional regulation.

source: 此外,在家长积极培养应对策略与儿童情绪调节适应性之间的纵向联系中,儿童性别起了调节作用:尽管这种联系很小,对女孩来说相对微小,而对于男孩则较大,并且具有统计学的显著意义。
target: Furthermore, child gender emerged as a moderating variable in the longitudinal association between socialization of engagement coping and child adaptive emotion regulation. Although this association was small and marginally significant for girls, it was large and statistically significant for boys.

source: 过渡到为人父母的时期是新任父母们面临的最紧张的调适期之一，无论是与个体自我的关系还是与他者的关系。
target: The transition to parenthood is one of the most stressful adjustment periods new parents face, whether in regard to their own individual relationship or in regard to their relationships with others.

source: 使用二元调整量表和斯特赖克调整清单量表来评估婚姻关系以及与对方父母的冲突关系。
target: The Binary Adjustment Scale and the Stryker Adjustment Inventory Scale were used to assess the marital relationship and the conflictual relationship with the other's parents.

source: 同时，多群组分析表明，在妊娠期间与父母同住的受试组中，与对方父母的冲突会引发婚内问题；而不与父母同住的受试组中，在怀孕后期到产后期，与对方父亲之间的关系冲突可能强化婚姻问题。
target: At the same time, multi-cluster analysis showed that in the group of subjects who lived with their parents during pregnancy, conflict with the other's parents caused marital problems; in the group of subjects who did not live with their parents, relationship conflicts with the other's father may exacerbate marriage problems during late pregnancy through the postpartum period.

source: 本研究旨在探索（1）过渡为家长期间，夫妻婚姻关系和与对方父母的冲突两者之间的双向关联性，以及（2）和父亲同住对上述关系的调适影响作用。
target: The purpose of the study was to explore (1) the bidirectional relationship between a husband and wife's marital relationship and conflict with each other's parents during the long-term transition to parenthood, and (2) the influence of living with a father on the adjustment of the above-mentioned relationships.

target_errors.term: between a husband and wife's marital relationship and conflict with each other's parents during the long-term transition to parenthood

source: 针对这种过渡时期的代际关系之间的双向关联的研究非常有限，而且相互关系的复杂性也会根据生活居住情境的不同而变化。
target: Research on bidirectional associations between intergenerational relationships during such transitional periods is extremely limited, and the complexity of the interrelationships can also vary depending on differences in living situations.

source: 本文的研究对象是359名已婚母亲，采用了三波前瞻性长期性研究设计。
target: The study population for this paper consisted of 359 married mothers, and a three-wave prospective long-term study design was used.

source: 研究相互关系时使用的是交叉时滞平面分析，确定这些关系是否随着生活情境的不同而呈现出不同的模式时使用的是多群组分析。
target: Cross-lagged panel analysis was used to study interrelationships, and multigroup analysis was used to determine whether these relationships showed different patterns across life situations.

source: 两个交叉－时滞模型表明，在怀孕中期至后期，婚内问题和与对方父母的冲突之间存在着双向关系。
target: Two cross-lagged models indicate a bidirectional relationship between marital problems and conflict with the other's parents in mid to late pregnancy.

source: 这些研究发现揭示了代际冲突的交叉时滞关联性。
target: These studies reveal the cross-lagged correlation of intergenerational conflicts.

source: 医疗保健专业人员有必要确保在过渡为父母的过程中，代际关系是积极有利的。
target: It is necessary for healthcare professionals to ensure that intergenerational relationships are positive and beneficial during the transition to parenthood.

source: 本研究丰富了我们对于和父亲同住这个因素对婚姻关系的作用的认知，并能指导基于特定文化的多维度干预方式的未来发展。
target: This study enriches our understanding of the impact of the factor of living with a father in marital relationships and can guide the future development of multidimensional styles of intervention based on specific cultures.

source: 研究认为男子童年时期的不良经历（ACEs）和精神创伤症状与其IPV犯罪行为（亲密伴侣暴力）和被虐待经历是有关联的，但是针对暴力实施干预措施时起到阻碍作用的几个重要方面尚未得到深入研究。
target: The study concluded that men's adverse childhood experiences (ACEs) and trauma symptoms are associated with intimate partner violence (IPV) criminal behaviors and maltreatment. However, several important aspects that act as barriers to the implementation of interventions targeting violence have not been thoroughly studied.

target_errors.term: However, several important aspects that act as barriers to the implementation of interventions targeting violence have not been thoroughly studied.

source: 具体而言，创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）主导了该领域所研究的创伤症状的范围，限制了研究者对创伤的其他表现形式的理解，尤其是男子的创伤。
target: Specifically, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) predominates among trauma symptoms studied in the field, limiting researchers' understanding of other manifestations of trauma, especially in men.

target_errors.term: predominates among trauma symptoms studied in the field,

source: 此外，大多数研究只侧重于男性在身体方面的 IPV 犯罪行为，很少聚焦于诸如其他类型的 IPV行为、暴力严重程度或男性受迫害等研究方向。
target: Furthermore, the emphasis of most research is on the male physical aspects of IPV crime. Rarely does research focus on other types of IPV behavior, the severity of the violence, or male persecution.

target_errors.term: the emphasis of most research is on the male physical aspects of IPV crime.
Rarely does research focus on other types of IPV behavior, the severity of the violence, or male persecution.

source: 另外，很少有研究关注基于ACE框架的可能性保护因素，例如临床人群的觉知行为。
target: In addition, few studies focus on possible protective factors based on the ACE framework, such as behavior awareness in clinical populations.

source: 最后，大多数研究的对象还尚未关注到有色人种，尽管一些种族/少数民族群体对IPV的接触率比较高。
target: Finally, research on IPV has yet to adequately focus on people of color, despite the fact that certain racial/ethnic minority groups have higher exposure rates to IPV.

target_errors.term: research on IPV has yet to adequately focus on people of color

source: 基于以上原因，本研究调查了IPV的发生频率和严重程度（心理、身体、伤害）与ACES、PTSD、创伤症状学（与PTSD区别开来），还有觉知的自我效能之间的相互关联。
target: For these reasons, this study investigates the correlation between IPV frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injury), ACES, PTSD, trauma symptomatology (distinguished from PTSD), and conscious self-efficacy.

source: 样本来自67个有色人种的男子，他们大多数属于低收入，正在参与虐妻行为干预计划。
target: The sample consisted of 67 men of color, most of whom were low-income and simultaneously participating in a wife-abuse intervention program.

source: 超过一半的样本（51.5%）报告曾经经历过四次或四次以上 ACEs ，有31.1%的被研究对象 满足疑似 PTSD 病人诊断标准。
target: Over half of the sample (51.5%) reported having experienced four or more ACEs, and 31.1% of those studied met the diagnostic criteria for suspected PTSD patients.

source: 较高的 ACE 分数预测了几乎所有类型的自报 的较高IPV 犯罪率和较高的受害比例。
target: Higher ACE scores were predictive of almost all types of self-reported higher IPV crime rates as well as higher victimization rates.

target_errors.term: Higher ACE scores were predictive of almost all types of self-reported higher IPV crime rates as well as higher victimization rates.

source: 觉知的自我效能与犯罪行为和受害经历发生减少，自我报告的心理方面的IPV频率和严重程度呈减少趋势有关。
target: Conscious self-efficacy was associated with a decrease in the occurrence of criminal behavior and victimization experiences, as well as a decrease in the frequency and severity of self-reported psychological IPV.

source: PTSD 症状和复杂性创伤症状的严重程度综合在一起解释了 13% 到 40% 的 IPV 结果，而且每种结果都与某些类型的自报 的IPV 受害和暴力实施频率和严重程度有独特的关联性。
target: The combined severity of PTSD symptoms and complex trauma symptoms accounted for 13 to 40 percent of IPV outcomes, with each outcome being uniquely associated with the frequency and severity of certain types of self-reported IPV victimization and violence.

source: 本研究综述了针对非主流的边缘化男性群体所采取的相关临床措施，包括筛查、培训和可能采用的治疗性干预方法。
target: This study reviews relevant clinical measures for a non-mainstream group of marginalized men, including screening, training, and possible therapeutic interventions.

source: 在22项研究中的9项中, 庇护过程的时长和停留时间被发现是最常被提及的心理健康困难因素。
target: In 9 out of 22 studies, the length of asylum process and the length of stay were the most commonly-cited factors of poor mental health.

source: 家庭相关困难还被发现与停留时间和法律地位有关, 同时还认为其他移民后变量居住和停留时间对心理健康的影响更大。
target: Familial difficulties were also found to be related to length of stay and legal status. Other post-immigration variables of residency and length of stay were also found to have a significant impact on mental health.

source: 相反, 法律地位的影响与其他移民后因素更加复杂地联系在一起。
target: Conversely, legal status and other post-immigration factors have more complex effects.

target_errors.term: legal status and other post-immigration factors have more complex effects

source: 它主要关注移民后应激源的影响 (包括庇护过程的时长和停留时间, 居住状态和社会融合) 以及它们对创伤后压力障碍, 焦虑和抑郁的影响。
target: It focuses on the impact of post-immigration stressors (including the length of the asylum process, length of stay, residence status, and social assimilation) on the symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety, and depression.

target_errors.term: on the symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety, and depression

source: 它被发现可以作为其他移民后变量的标志, 包括孤独, 歧视, 沟通或语言问题。
target: It has been found to be an indication of other post-migration challenges, including loneliness, discrimination, and language or communication problems.

target: Compared with K562/-cells, the expression level of BAX mRNA of the pro-apoptotic gene in K562/STAT3 cells decreased significantly (P=0.005), and the apoptosis caused by doxorubicin was significantly reduced (P=0.002). After treatment of K562/STAT3 cells with STAT3 inhibitor (SH-4-54), the expression level of pro-apoptotic gene BAX mRNA increased significantly (P=0.017), and apoptosis also increased significantly (P=0.005).

source: 与K562/-细胞相比，K562/STAT3细胞NKG2D配体（MICA和ULBP1）mRNA的表达水平明显下降（P<0.0001），MICA和ULBP1蛋白的表达水平亦明显下降（MICA：P=0.001，ULBP1：P=0.022）；用STAT3抑制剂（SH-4-54）处理K562/STAT3细胞后，MICA mRNA和蛋白表达水平升高（mRNA：P=0.001，蛋白：P=0.002），但ULBP1 mRNA和蛋白无明显改变（mRNA：P=0.137，蛋白：P=0.1905）。
target: The expression levels of NKG2D ligands (MICA and ULBP1) mRNA were significantly decreased in K562/STAT3 cells compared to K562/- cells (P<0.0001). The expression levels of MICA and ULBP1 protein were also decreased in K562/STAT3 cells (MICA: P=0.001, ULBP1: P=0.022). Treatment of K562/STAT3 cells with STAT3 inhibitor SH-4-54 resulted in increased levels of MICA mRNA and protein expression (mRNA: P=0.001, protein: P=0.002), but no significant changes in ULBP1 mRNA and protein (mRNA: P=0.137, protein: P=0.1905).

source: NK细胞对耐药K562/STAT3细胞的杀伤能力较K562/-细胞下降（P=0.002），但是STAT3抑制剂恢复了K562/STAT3细胞对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性（P=0.006）. STAT3磷酸化介导了耐药白血病细胞抗凋亡，降低其对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性。
target: NK cells had a decreased killing capacity compared to K562/- cells for drug-resistant K562/STAT3 cells (P = 0.002), but STAT3 inhibitors restored K562/STAT3 cells' killing sensitivity to NK cells (P = 0.006). STAT3 phosphorylation mediates anti-apoptosis in drug-resistant leukemia cells and reduces their susceptibility to killing NK cells.

source: 空气中污染物及病菌的浓度直接影响人类健康。
target: The concentration of pollutants and microbes in the air directly affects human health.

target: Therefore, developing a quantitative index for effective air filtration and using this index to track air quality in specific areas in real time is important to help solve the urgent problem of guiding residents to choose healthier outdoor activity sites.

target: In this study, the Reynolds-averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) method was used to establish an urban air pollution simulation system based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) technology, and the relationship between wind speed, pollutant concentration, and pollutant diffusion efficiency was studied.

source: 摘要: 角膜墨染术 (Corneal keratopigmentation KTP) 在治疗角膜混浊的患者有着悠久的历史。
target: Abstract: For years, corneal keratopigmentation (KTP) has been used to treat patients with corneal clouding.

source: 探讨并分析多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者在硼替佐米化疗期间发生带状疱疹的危险因素。

source: 收集2015年1月到2019年１月于甘肃省人民医院接受以硼替佐米为主的化疗方案治疗的85例MM患者的临床资料, 依据是否发生带状疱疹分为病例组和对照组。
target: Clinical data from 85 MM patients receiving bortezomib-based chemotherapy treatments at Gansu Provincial People's Hospital from January 2015 to January 2019 were collected and divided into case and control groups based on the presence of herpes zoster.

source: 对其临床特点、治疗和转归及发生带状疱疹的危险因素进行回顾性分析。
target: Clinical characteristics, treatment/regression, and risk factors for development of herpes zoster were analyzed retrospectively.

source: 单因素分析显示, 年龄≥65岁、治疗前淋巴细胞减少、治疗前中性粒细胞减少、ECOG评分≥2、使用环磷酰胺、未给予预防性抗病毒治疗与带状疱疹发生相关（P＜0.05）。
target: Univariate analysis showed that an age ≥65 years, pre-treatment lymphopenia, pre-treatment neutropenia, ECOG scores ≥2, use of cyclophosphamide, and no preventive antiviral treatments were all associated with the development of herpes zoster (P<0.05).

source: MM患者带状疱疹发生率高, 治疗前淋巴细胞减少、环磷酰胺的使用、未给予预防性抗病毒治疗是发生带状疱疹重要的危险因素, 临床医生需引起重视。

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one out of every five children are reported to experience some sort of mental health issues, including Disruptive Behavior Disorders (DBDs).

target: As part of a randomized study, this paper examined adolescents in 30 schools in Uganda who exhibited behavioral problems, as well as their respective caregivers.

target: Effective interventions for childhood DBDs have been developed and tested in impoverished communities in developed countries.

source: 但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。
target: However, in most African countries like Uganda, such interventions are still rare.

source: 该论文描述了一项源自美国的循证干预措施在乌干达的国情下如何尽可能优化并保持原有效度的调适过程。
target: The paper describes how an evidence-based DBD intervention derived from the United States can be optimized to maintain as much effectiveness as possible in the national context of Uganda.

source: 研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。
target: The research process involved the following steps: An initial gathering of principals and teachers was held to present the content of the study and the main concepts of the intervention. The Uganda team was organized to comprehensively learn the 4Rs and 2Ss related content at the initial stage. Community stakeholders were invited to actively participate and provide additional feedback on both the content and the cultural appropriateness of the interventions. The final revision of the instruction manual was produced. Children's drawings were then collected for use in editing manuals.

source: 细胞焦亡作为一种新型的细胞死亡方式广泛参与呼吸系统的疾病，如肺纤维化、急性肺损伤/呼吸窘迫综合征、支气管发育不良、慢性阻塞性肺疾病和哮喘等。
target: Pyroptosis is a newly discovered type of cell death that is involved in a variety of respiratory diseases, including pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung injury/respiratory distress syndrome, bronchial dysplasia, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, and asthma.

source: 本文综述细胞焦亡的发生机制以及在不同呼吸系统疾病中的作用，以期为呼吸系统疾病的治疗提供新思路。
target: The aim of this paper is to review the mechanisms of pyroptosis and its role in different respiratory diseases and provide new ideas for the disease treatment.

source: 肾也是病毒攻击的主要器官之一，病毒通过血管紧张素转换酶2(ACE2)直接损伤肾小管，并引起细胞因子风暴导致肾损伤，增加患者的死亡风险。
target: The kidneys are also one of the major organs attacked by the virus as it directly damages the renal tubules through angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), starting a cytokine storm that can lead to kidney injury and increase fatality risk.

source: 分析利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, DLBCL）患者的疗效，并探讨难治复发患者的高危因素. 对2012年12月-2018年12月东南大学附属中大医院血液科收治的72例初治DLBCL患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析，分析DLBCL患者应用利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案化疗的缓解率。
target: To analyze the efficacy of rituximab in combination with CHOP/EPOCH regimen in patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL), and to explore the risk factors for relapse in patients with refractory disease. Clinical data from 72 patients admitted to the Department of Hematology of Zhongda Hospital of Southeast University and newly-treated with DLBCL from December 2012 to December 2018 were retrospectively analyzed to determine response rates of DLBCL patients treated with rituximab in combination with CHOP/EPOCH chemotherapy.

source: 汶川地震发生9年半后，在872名中国青少年使用自我报告问卷进行了评估。
target: Nine and a half years after the Wenchuan earthquake, self-reported questionnaire responses from 872 Chinese adolescents were collected and assessed.

source: 结果显示，父母依恋与PTG有直接关联，两个显著的一阶间接（one-step indirect ）（通过公正信念和认知重新评估）关联PTG，两个显著的二阶间接关联（通过公正信念到安全感和通过认知到公正信念）和一个显著的三阶间接关联（通过安全感到公正信念到认知重评）。
target: The results showed that parental attachment behaviors were directly associated with PTG outcomes based on the following associations: two significant one-step indirect associations (through just beliefs and cognitive reappraisal), two significant two-step indirect associations (through just beliefs to security and through cognitive reappraisal to just beliefs), and one significant three-step indirect association (through security to just beliefs to cognitive reappraisal).

source: 结果表明，安全感，公正信念和认知重评中介了父母依恋与PTG之间的关联。
target: The results suggest that feelings of security, belief in justice, and cognitive reappraisal can mediate the effect of parental attachment behaviors on adolescent PTG.

source: 这些研究结果突出了家庭观点的重要性，临床心理学家可以通过帮助他们建立积极的父母依恋来促进青少年的PTG。
target: These findings highlight the importance of a family perspective, and indicate that clinical psychologists can promote PTG in adolescents by helping them build positive and secure attachments to their parents.

source: 本研究旨在阐明父母依恋对青少年创伤后生长（PTG）的影响机制。
target: This study aims to illuminate the mechanisms of influence of parental attachment on adolescent post-traumatic growth (PTG).

source: 随着工业的发展，肌肉骨骼疾患问题日渐凸显，下背痛是主要问题之一，美国和德国已将其纳入职业病范畴。
target: With the development of industry, musculoskeletal diseases have become increasingly prominent. Lower back pain is a major complaint, such that both the United States and Germany have included it in the category of occupational diseases.

target_errors.term: Lower back pain is a major complaint, such that both the United States and Germany have included it in the category of occupational diseases.

target: This article reviews existing literature on load evaluation methods with respect to lower back pain and provides a reference for the implementation of lower back pain prevention strategies via occupational factors.

target: The findings support the conclusion that attachment behaviors of both partners can act as a buffer against the typically negative impact of disapproval from social network members on relationship outcomes.

source: 目的 利用2100生物分析仪结合蛋白芯片获取死后大鼠肝组织蛋白质表达谱，推测其与死亡时间的关系。
target: Objective: To use the 2100 bioanalyzer in combination with protein microarrays to obtain protein expression profiles of postmortem rat liver tissues, and to identify a possible relationship with the time of death.

target_errors.term: identify a possible relationship with the time of death.

source: 方法 大鼠腹腔麻醉致死后置于16 ℃环境中，提取死后14个时间点肝组织中的水溶性蛋白质，使用蛋白芯片获取相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的蛋白质表达谱数据，并利用主成分分析（principal component analysis，PCA）、偏最小二乘-判别分析（partial least squares-discriminant analysis，PLS-DA）、Fisher判别对数据进行分析。
target: Methods: After the rats were killed by intraperitoneal anesthesia and placed at 16 degrees Celsius, the water-soluble proteins were extracted from the liver tissues at 14 distinct time intervals after death. The protein expression profiles with relative molecular masses ranging from 14,000 to 230,000 were obtained using protein microarrays and analyzed via principal component analysis (PCA), partial least squares-discriminant analysis (PLS-DA), and Fisher's discriminant.

target_errors.term: After the rats were killed by intraperitoneal anesthesia and placed at 16 degrees Celsius,
the water-soluble proteins were extracted from the liver tissues at 14 distinct time intervals after death.

source: 结果 根据蛋白质表达谱的变化和PLS-DA结果将死亡时间分为A组（0 d）、B组（1~9 d）、C组（12~30 d）。
target: Results: Based on the changes of the protein expression profile and the PLS-DA results, the time of death was divided into Group A (0 days), Group B (1-9 dasy), and Group C (12-30 days).

target_errors.term: Group A (0 days), Group B (1-9 dasy), and Group C (12-30 days).

source: 通过建立B、C组各时间点的Fisher判别模型缩小推断死亡时间窗口，B组中训练集及测试集的预测准确率均为100.0%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为100.0%；C组中训练集及测试集的预测准确率分别为95.2%、78.6%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为88.1%。
target: By narrowing down the inferred time window of death, the Fisher discriminant model was built for each time interval in Groups B and C. The prediction accuracy of both the training set and the test set in Group B was 100.0%, while the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set was also 100.0%. In Group C, the prediction accuracy values of the training set and the test set were 95.2% and 78.6%, respectively, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set was 88.1%.

target_errors.term: By narrowing down the inferred time window of death, the Fisher discriminant model was built for each time interval in Groups B and C.
In Group C, the prediction accuracy values of the training set and the test set were 95.2% and 78.6%, respectively, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set was 88.1%.

source: 结论 蛋白芯片检测技术可以快捷简便地获取大鼠死后不同时间点肝组织相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的水溶性蛋白质表达谱，建立PLS-DA及Fisher判别模型对死亡时间进行分类预测判断，有望为死亡时间推断提供新的思路和方法。
target: In conclusion, protein chip detection technology can quickly and easily obtain the expression profiles of water-soluble proteins with a relative molecular mass of 14 000~230 000 in rat liver tissue at different time intervals after death, and establish PLS-DA and Fisher discriminant models to classify and predict the time of death. These models can provide new ideas and methods to accurately infer time of death.

source: 经Fisher判别，模型的训练集及测试集的预测准确率均为100.0%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为100.0%。
target: Following Fisher's discriminant analysis, the model exhibited a 100% prediction accuracy on both the training and test sets, and an internal cross-validation accuracy of 100% on the training set.

source: 探讨影响多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者总生存期的非遗传学相关因素。
target: To explore non-genetic factors influencing overall survival time in patients with multiple myeloma (MM).

target: The non-genetic factors were analyzed, and overall survival time was used as the prognostic evaluation standard.

source: 化学性眼损伤 (Chemical eye injury, CEI) 是严重威胁视力和生命的急症, 通常发生在家里或工作场所, 前者一般较轻, 而后者较重, 并且双眼受累。
target: Chemical eye injury (CEI) can result in blindness and death, and usually occurs either at home or in the workplace. CEIs that occur at home are typically less severe, while those that occur in the workplace are typically more severe and affect bilateral eyes.

target_errors.term: CEIs that occur at home are typically less severe, while those that occur in the workplace are typically more severe and affect bilateral eyes.

source: 严重的工作意外伤害还涉及其他身体部位的损伤, 可能与吸入或吞入化学物质有关。
target: Serious workplace accidental injuries related to inhalation or ingestion of chemicals often also involve other areas of the body.

target_errors.term: Serious workplace accidental injuries related to inhalation or ingestion of chemicals often also involve other areas of the body.

target: Acid damage can cause tissue to rapidly coagulate, which can prevent penetration and limit further damage.

source: 刺激性物质——如酒精可造成表层上皮剥脱。
target: Irritating substances like alcohol can cause peeling of the superficial epithelium.

source: 严重的化学损伤会影响整个眼前节结构, 造成虹膜、瞳孔及晶状体异常。
target: Severe chemical damage can affect all anterior structures of the eye, resulting in iris, pupil, and lens abnormalities.

source: 眼压受到的影响不一, 可能会降低或升高, 或从一开始的眼压情况迅速转变为另一种。

source: 脉络膜视网膜血管病变被认为继发于眼前节炎症, 而不是因为CEI的直接作用。
target: Choroidal retinovascular disease is thought to be secondary to inflammation of the anterior segment, and therefore is not considered an immediate effect of CEI.

source: 与结构及功能相关的最终结果取决于致伤物、暴露时间、治疗手段及其干预的速度。
target: The final outcome is related to structure and function, and depends on the agent of injury, duration of exposure, means of treatment, and speed of intervention.

source: 在确定双眼PH值后, 通过大量和持久的眼部冲洗以防止进一步损伤, 以及寻找和清除所有微粒物质是关键。
target: After neutralizing the pH of both eyes, copious amounts of eye irrigation and removal of all particulate matter from the eyes will help prevent further damage.

source: 其他治疗原则包括对眼部的全面评估、控制炎症、促进愈合以及后遗症和并发症的预防及管理。

source: 管理通常需要多学科的合作。
target: Management typically requires multidisciplinary cooperation.

source: 骨肉瘤是最常见的骨恶性肿瘤。
target: Osteosarcoma is the most common bone malignancy.

source: Notch信号通路在骨肉瘤细胞增殖中起重要作用，同时通过减少细胞内药物累积、调控上皮-间质转化、导致微RNA失调和细胞凋亡基因的表达紊乱、调节肿瘤干细胞等方面影响肿瘤的耐药性。
target: The Notch signaling pathway plays an important role in the proliferation of osteosarcoma cells and also affects tumor drug resistance by reducing intracellular drug accumulation, upregulating epithelial-mesenchymal transition, dysregulating microRNAs and deranging expression of apoptotic genes, and upregulating tumor stem cells.

source: 从20世纪70年代起，人类就开始使用化学治疗药物来治疗骨肉瘤。
target: Since the 1970's, chemotherapy has been used to treat osteosarcoma.

source: 然而，多药耐药作为影响化学治疗药物疗效的主要不良反应之一，在不同程度上降低了骨肉瘤患者的生存率。
target: Multidrug resistance, a major adverse reaction that lowers the efficacy of drugs, reduced the survival rate of osteosarcoma patients by varying degrees.

source: 对人工全膝关节置换术（total knee arthroplasty，TKA）及人工全髋关节置换术（total hip arthroplasty，THA）的围术期血液管理（perioperative blood managment，PBM）措施进行综述。
target: Perioperative blood management (PBM) measures of total knee arthroplasty (TKA) and total hip arthroplasty (THA) were reviewed.

source: 全面阅读并总结近年国内外关于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 措施的进展，结合四川大学华西医院临床实践经验，从优化造血、减少失血和输血三方面深入评价并分析各种措施的优劣，为临床选择提供依据。
target: Fully read and summarize recent developments in PBM measures for TKA and THA from home and abroad. Integrating the clinical practice experience of West China Hospital of Sichuan University, the advantages and disadvantages of various measures were thoroughly evaluated and analyzed to determine the three most critical aspects of hematopoiesis, blood loss reduction, and blood transfusions, thus providing a basis for clinical selection.

target_errors.term: Fully read and summarize recent developments in PBM measures for TKA and THA from home and abroad

source: 目前用于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 方式较多，其中优化造血主要包括围术期应用铁剂及促红细胞生成素；减少失血措施包括使用止血带、术中进行控制性降压及围术期应用抗纤溶药物；自体输血主要包括预存自体输血、血液稀释法自体输血以及术中自体血液回输；而异体输血则为治疗贫血的最终手段。
target: Currently, there are more PBM methods for TKA and THA. Optimal hematopoietic conditions often include perioperative use of iron and erythropoietin. Blood loss reduction measures include tourniquet use, intraoperative controlled hypotension, and use of perioperative antifibrinolytic agents. Autologous blood transfusion can be performed through preoperative autologous blood donation, hemodilution autologous blood transfusion, or intraoperative autologous blood transfusion. Allogeneic blood transfusion is considered a last-resort treatment for anemia.

source: 目前用于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 方式较多，其中优化造血主要包括围术期应用铁剂及促红细胞生成素；减少失血措施包括使用止血带、术中进行控制性降压及围术期应用抗纤溶药物；自体输血主要包括预存自体输血、血液稀释法自体输血以及术中自体血液回输；而异体输血则为治疗贫血的最终手段。
target: Currently, there are more PBM methods for TKA and THA. Optimal hematopoietic conditions often include perioperative use of iron and erythropoietin. Blood loss reduction measures include tourniquet use, intraoperative controlled hypotension, and use of perioperative antifibrinolytic agents. Autologous blood transfusion can be performed through preoperative autologous blood donation, hemodilution autologous blood transfusion, or intraoperative autologous blood transfusion. Allogeneic blood transfusion is considered a last-resort treatment for anemia.

target_errors.term: preoperative erythropoietin combined with iron for blood mobilization applied

source: TKA 及 THA 围术期应根据患者身体及经济情况，个性化选择单一或多种血液管理措施以减少失血及异体输血需求，加速患者术后康复。
target: In the perioperative period of TKA and THA, personalized choices of single or multiple blood management measures should be made according to the patient's physical and monetary limitations, in order to reduce blood loss and allogeneic blood transfusion needs and accelerate the patient's postoperative recovery.

source: 复合杂合突变致遗传性凝血因子Ⅴ缺陷症家系的表型与基因型分析. 通过检测复合杂合突变导致遗传性凝血因子Ⅴ（FⅤ）缺陷家系的表型和基因突变分析，探讨其分子发病机制. 检测先证者及其家系成员（共3代10人）血浆凝血酶原时间（PT）、活化部分凝血活酶时间（APTT）、纤维蛋白原（FIB）、FⅤ促凝活性（FⅤ∶C）、FⅤ抗原（FⅤ∶Ag）及其他相关凝血指标以明确诊断。
target: Phenotypic and genotypic analysis of families with hereditary coagulation factor V deficiency due to compound heterozygous mutations. Phenotypic and genotypic analysis of families with hereditary coagulation factor V (FV) deficiency due to compound heterozygous mutations was performed to investigate molecular pathogenesis of the disease. Plasma prothrombin time (PT), activated partial thromboplastin time (APTT), fibrinogen (FIB), FV procoagulant activity (FV:C), FV antigen (FV:Ag) and other relevant coagulation markers were measured in the pre-existing patients and their family members (10 individuals in 3 generations) to provide further differential data for diagnosis.

target_errors.term: Phenotypic and genotypic analysis of families with hereditary coagulation factor V deficiency due to compound heterozygous mutations.

source: 使用ClustalX-2.1-win软件分析突变氨基酸的保守性，PROVEAN和MutationTaster在线生物信息学软件预测突变对蛋白质功能的影响，Swiss-PdbViewer软件在突变位点上进行蛋白质模型和氨基酸相互作用分析. 先证者PT和APTT较正常对照健康体检者显著延长，分别为34.2 vs 13.2 s和119.3 vs 36.0 s；FⅤ∶C和FⅤ∶Ag极度降低，分别为3％和6％。
target: ClustalX-2.1-win software was used to analyze the mutated amino acids. The PROVEAN and MutationTaster online bioinformatics software predicted the effect of mutations on protein function. The Swiss-PdbViewer software performed protein modeling and amino acid interaction analysis at the mutated sites. The probands had significantly prolonged PT and APTT, 34.2 seconds and 119.3 seconds, respectively, compared to the normal control subjects, 13.2 seconds and 36.0 seconds, respectively. The probands also exhibited extremely reduced levels of FⅤ:C and FⅤ:Ag, at 3% and 6%, respectively.

target_errors.term: The probands also exhibited extremely reduced levels of FⅤ:C and FⅤ:Ag, at 3% and 6%, respectively.

source: 先证者的第二子、第三子、女儿和孙子的PT和APTT略有延长，FⅤ∶C和FⅤ∶Ag均有不同程度的降低，其他家庭成员的相关凝血参数均在正常范围内。
target: The PT and APTT of the second son, third son, daughter, and grandson of the proband were slightly prolonged, and FⅤ:C and FⅤ:Ag were decreased to varying degrees. The coagulation parameters of other family members were all within the normal range.

source: 先证者6号外显子上存在c.911G> A杂合错义突变，导致p.Gly276Glu；16号外显子上存在c.5343C> G杂合错义突变，导致p.Ser1781Arg。
target: The proband had a c.911G>A heterozygous missense mutation on exon 6, resulting in p.Gly276Glu, as well as a c.5343C>G heterozygous missense mutation on exon 16, resulting in p.Ser1781Arg.

source: 其第二子、第三子和孙子均携带p.Gly276Glu的杂合子，其女儿携带p.Ser1781Arg的杂合子，其他家庭成员均为野生型。
target: His second and third sons, and his grandson, were all heterozygous for p.Gly276Glu, while his daughter was heterozygous for p.Ser1781Arg. The other family members were wild-type.

target_errors.term: His second and third sons, and his grandson,
were all heterozygous for p.Gly276Glu, while his daughter was heterozygous for p.Ser1781Arg.

source: p.Gly276Glu蛋白质模型分析显示，Glu侧链延长，分子量变大，这将增加它与周围氨基酸之间的空间位阻，影响FⅤ蛋白的正常局部折叠，最终导致蛋白质活性和含量降低。
target: Analysis of the p.Gly276Glu protein model showed that the Glu side chain was extended, and increased in molecular weight. This would increase steric hindrance between it and the surrounding amino acids, affecting the native local folding of the FⅤ protein and ultimately leading to a decrease in protein activity and content.

source: 由于尚无16号外显子FⅤ的X射线3D结构文件，本研究无法对p.Ser1781Arg突变蛋白进行空间结构分析. 在本研究中鉴定的新型复合杂合突变（p.Gly276Glu和p.Ser1781Arg）是该家系FⅤ水平下降的主要原因，其中p.Ser1781Arg国内外鲜见报道。
target: Spatial structural analysis of the p.Ser1781Arg mutant protein was not possible in this study due to a lack of X-ray 3D structural files of exon F16. The novel complex heterozygous mutations identified in this study (p.Gly276Glu and p.Ser1781Arg) are the main cause of the decline in F5 levels in this family, of which p.Ser1781Arg is rarely reported domestically or internationally.

source: 采用DNA直接测序分析F5基因的所有外显子、侧翼、5′和3′非翻译区及家系成员相应的突变位点区域，发现突变位点用反向测序证实。
target: All exons, flanks, 5′ and 3′ untranslated regions of the F5 gene and corresponding mutation site regions of family members were analyzed by direct DNA sequencing, while gene mutation sites were confirmed via reverse sequencing.

source: 保守分析结果表明，Gly276和Ser1781在同源物种中高度保守。
target: Conservation analysis results showed that Gly276 and Ser1781 were highly conserved among homologous species.

source: 2种生物信息学软件的预测结果相同，PROVEAN（得分-6.214和-12.79）表明，该复合杂合突变是一种有害突变；MutationTaster（得分0.976和0.999）提示，这些突变可能引起相应疾病。
target: The prediction results of the two bioinformatics software were the same. PROVEAN (scores -6.214 and -12.79) indicated that the compound heterozygous mutation was a deleterious mutation; MutationTaster (scores 0.976 and 0.999) suggested that these mutations might result in disease.

source: 研究急性早幼粒细胞白血病（APL）患者呼气成分中的挥发性有机化合物（VOC）特征，探讨VOC用于APL诊断及疗效评估的可行性. 以APL患者和健康人为研究对象，采用SPME-GC/MS技术检测受试者呼出气体中的VOC；比较分析APL初诊组、复发组、缓解组和健康组呼气中的VOC成分，使用Kruskal-Wallis方差分析APL不同疾病状态组特征性VOC差异并应用Dunn-Bonferroni检验进行两两比较. 初诊APL患者的二甲基硫醚、甲苯和十二烷值明显高于健康人，而乙醇、正己烷和苯甲醛值明显低于健康人（P<0.05）。
target: To study the characteristics of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) in the exhaled breath of patients with acute promyelocytic leukemia (APL) and investigate the feasibility of using VOCs for the diagnosis and efficacy assessment of APL. The SPME-GC/MS technique was used to detect VOCs in the exhaled breath of APL patients and healthy subjects. The VOC components in the exhaled breath of the APL primary diagnosis group, relapse group, remission group, and healthy group were compared. Differences in characteristic VOCs between the different disease state groups of APL were analyzed using the Kruskal-Wallis ANOVA and the Dunn-Bonferroni test for two-by-two comparison. The results showed that dimethyl sulfide, toluene, and dodecane values were significantly higher in patients with initial APL diagnosis when compared to healthy subjects, whereas ethanol, n-hexane, and benzaldehyde values were significantly lower (P<0.05).

source: 与初诊组相比，缓解组二甲基硫醚、甲苯和十二烷明显减少，乙醇、正己烷和苯甲醛明显增加（P<0.05），而复发组的VOC与缓解组正好相反. 二甲基硫醚、甲苯、十二烷、乙醇、苯甲醛和正己烷可作为APL诊断和病情评估的生物标记物。
target: Compared to the initial diagnosis group, dimethylthioether, toluene and dodecane were significantly reduced in the remission group, while ethanol, n-hexane and benzaldehyde were significantly increased in the remission group (P<0.05). However, VOC levels of the relapse group contrasted with those of the remission group. Dimethylthioether, toluene, dodecane, ethanol, benzaldehyde and n-hexane can be used as biomarkers for APL diagnosis and disease assessment.

source: 低收入伴侣的关系教育（RE）干预的结果有好也有坏。
target: Based on the collected data, the various relationship education (RE) interventions for low-income partners yielded mixed results.

source: 很多低收入的伴侣参加政府资助的关系教育，同时对社会和社区的支持等方面的资源获取和利用却十分有限。
target: With limited access to personal network resources like social and community support, many low-income couples participated in government-funded RE interventions.

source: 项目模型通常提供了相关的资源来补充关系教育中的具体技巧训练。
target: Project models often provide relevant resources that correspond to specific skills in relationship education.

source: 研究对象为参加关系教育的856对低收入伴侣，来自多种族。
target: The study involved 856 low-income couples of varying race who participated in relationship education.

target: This paper studies the relationship between income, social support, and family functionality, as well as the potential mediating effect of social support on family functionality outcomes.

target_errors.term: between income, social support, and family functionality

target: It remains unclear which aspects of the program model acted as positive change facilitators for couples who reported relationship improvements.

source: 分析包括三个独立的二元模型，用于研究相关的处在在基线的元素之间的关联性，和也包括立刻跟踪关系教育干预的结果。
target: Included in the analysis were three independent binary models that were used to study the correlation between relevant baseline elements and short-term results of relationship education interventions.

source: 研究结果显示参与者报告的社会支持和家庭功能之间的关系表现在：(a) 社会支持和和男性、女性的基线家庭功能都有相关性； (b) 男性基线社会支持受女性基线家庭功能影响; (c) 男性和女性的社会支持变化分数对他们自身的家庭功能变化分数有积极影响。
target: The research results indicated a relationship between social support and family functionality reported by the participants was as follows: (a) social support scores were linked to baseline levels of family functionality in both men and women; (b) baseline scores of social support in men were affected by baseline levels of family functionality in women; (c) change in scores of social support for both men and women showed a positive correlation with change in scores of family functionality.

source: 但是社会支持并不是家庭功能变化的重要调节因素。
target: However, social support is not a moderator of family functionality.

source: 关系教育如何实施和相关研究在研究启示部分有所讨论。
target: Implementation of relationship education and related research are discussed in the Research Implications section.

source: 对髋关节镜治疗髋臼盂唇损伤的常见手术方式进行综述，为临床治疗提供参考。
target: A review of common surgical procedures for hip arthroscopy in the treatment of acetabular labral injuries is included to provide a reference for clinical treatment.

source: 查阅近年国内外髋关节镜治疗髋臼盂唇损伤的手术方式和临床结果相关文献，进行分析和总结。
target: Reviews of recent literature on domestic and foreign surgical methods as well as clinical results of hip arthroscopy usage in treatment of acetabulum labrum injuries were analyzed and summarized.

target: In the early days of hip arthroscopy, the primary treatment for labral tears was debridement.

source: 目前的治疗原则是根据盂唇撕裂程度决定手术方式，包括髋臼盂唇清理术、髋臼盂唇修复术、髋臼盂唇重建术以及髋臼盂唇加强术等。
target: According to current standards, surgical treatments are selected based on the severity of the labral tear. Treatment methods include acetabular labral debridement, acetabular labral repair, acetabular labral reconstruction, and acetabular labral reinforcement.

source: 目前的治疗原则是根据盂唇撕裂程度决定手术方式，包括髋臼盂唇清理术、髋臼盂唇修复术、髋臼盂唇重建术以及髋臼盂唇加强术等。
target: According to current standards, surgical treatments are selected based on the severity of the labral tear. Treatment methods include acetabular labral debridement, acetabular labral repair, acetabular labral reconstruction, and acetabular labral reinforcement.

source: 为实现世界卫生组织提出的"2030年消除病毒性肝炎作为重大公共卫生威胁"的目标，慢性乙型肝炎（CHB）治疗药物的研发领域近年正处于快速发展阶段。
target: In order to achieve the World Health Organization's goal of "eliminating viral hepatitis as a major public health threat by 2030", the rate of research and development of chronic hepatitis B (CHB) treatment drugs has accelerated in recent years.

source: 早期临床试验（包括首次人体试验）关注于受试者的选择、研究设计、给药剂量和方式的选择、剂量爬坡、不良事件/反应（耐受性评价）的监测、观察和报告程序，以及受试者继续给药和停止给药的标准。
target: Early clinical trials (including human trials) focused on subject selection, study design, choice of dose, administration method, dose escalation, monitoring, observation/reporting of adverse events/reactions (tolerance evaluation), and the criteria for continued and discontinued administration in the subject.

source: 需要引入定量药理学知识来分析药物的体内暴露量与药效、不良反应的关系，以及纳入探索性指标：乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）RNA、HBV核心相关抗原（HBcrAg）等，来分析新药作用机制和靶点及其抗肝细胞内HBV共价闭合环状DNA的药效。
target: Knowledge of quantitative pharmacology should be used to analyze in vivo exposure to drugs in relation to drug efficacy and adverse side effects. Exploratory metrics, such as hepatitis B virus (HBV) RNA and HBV core-related antigen (HBcrAg), should also be incorporated to analyze the mechanism of action and target of new drugs, as well as determine their efficacy against HBV covalently closed circular DNA in hepatocytes.

source: 根据国内外有关文献，并结合作者早期临床研究的实践经验,简要介绍CHB创新性药物临床试验设计中应关注的临床问题。
target: Based on domestic and foreign papers in conjunction with the author's experience in early clinical research, facts about clinical issues in the design of innovative drug clinical trials for CHB were briefly introduced.

source: 而II～III期临床试验则更关注最佳剂量、疗效、安全性指标，验证新药在更大受试者人群范围内所选择剂量的疗效和安全性。
target: Phase II and III clinical trials focus more heavily on achieving the optimal dose, efficacy, and safety indicators to assure safety of the new drug at the selected dosages when administered to a larger subject population.

source: 精神卫生问题的发生、发展及对其管理都需要相对较长的时间，所以相当一部分精神病学研究—— 特别是能够明确回答有关生物、心理和社会因素复杂的相互作用的研究——要求对患者及其生活环境进行跨时长久的多种评估。
target: The occurrence, development, and management of mental health problems takes a relatively long time. Therefore, a considerable number of psychiatric studies, especially those aiming to clearly understand the complex interactions of biological, psychological, and social factors, may require multiple patient and living environment assessments over a long period of time.

source: 本文就纵向数据分析的话题做了介绍。
target: This article introduces the topic of longitudinal data analysis.

source: 本文就纵向数据分析的话题做了介绍。
target: This article introduces the topic of longitudinal data analysis.

source: 然而，许多精神病学的研究人员使用不正确的统计方法来分析这一类型的纵向数据，这一问题会导致分析结果中出现无法识别的偏倚而由此得出不正确的结论。
target: However, many researchers in psychiatry use statistical methods that are inappropriate for analyzing this type of longitudinal data. This may lead to unrecognizable biases in the results and subsequently incorrect analysis conclusions.

source: 临床实践指南, 如关注于创伤性应激治疗的指南, 可以在提升包容性和公平性方面发挥重要作用。
target: Clinical practice guideline manuals, such as those guiding post-traumatic stress treatments, can play an important role in promoting inclusion and equity.

source: 在对14项明确提及儿童的国际创伤治疗指导文件综述的基础上, 我们对这些指南可以变得更具包容性和公平性的两个领域进行了反思; a) 儿童文化背景的体现, b) 儿童表达其声音的机会。
target: Based on a review of 14 international trauma treatment guidance documents specifically catered towards children, we reflected on two areas where these guidelines could be made more inclusive and fair: a) acknowledgement of children's cultural backgrounds, and b) increased opportunities for children to be heard.

source: 尽管有几条准则提到应根据儿童的文化需求量身定制治疗方法, 但关于这一点如何实现的指导却很少。
target: Although several guidelines mention the importance of tailoring treatment to each child's cultural needs, there is minimal guidance on how to achieve this.

target_errors.term: Although several guidelines mention the importance of tailoring treatment to each child's cultural needs, there is minimal guidance on how to achieve this.

source: 而且, 在产生和评估国际证据基础的各个阶段, 似乎仍然有强烈的西方白人眼光。
target: Additionally, there seems to be a significant Caucasian/Western influence on all stages of generation and assessment of the evidence base.

source: 现有指南还意味着在指南开发过程中未咨询18岁以下的青年。
target: Individuals under the age of 18 were not consulted during the development of these current guidelines.

target_errors.term: Individuals under the age of 18 were not consulted during the development of these current guidelines.

source: 为了促进包容性和公平性, 我们建议了未来国家指南制定工作的五个要素。
target: To promote inclusiveness and equity, five elements are suggested for inclusion in future national guideline development.

source: 我们国家, 地区和全球专业协会在 (继续) 促进这一领域的对话和行动方面处于优势地位。
target: National, regional, and global professional associations are well-positioned to (continue to) promote dialogue and action in this area.

source: 对于目前代表性不足的群体, 与其一同以及针对目前代表性不足的群体来促进研究和指南开发, 应该是我们领域的高度优先事项。
target: Promoting research and guideline development with, and for, currently underrepresented groups should be a high priority in our field.

source: 结合针灸针材料特性、新兴连接技术与注塑工艺，并经过力学测试，研制一种通过靠近即可与针灸针连接、外型规则、制作工艺简单的新型电针仪磁力接头。
target: The material characteristics of acupuncture needles, emerging connection technologies, and injection molding processes were combined. Mechanical testing was conducted to develop a new type of magnetic connector for electro-acupuncture instruments. This connector can be connected to acupuncture needles in close proximity, has a regular appearance, and can be manufactured through relatively simple production processes.

source: 此接头由内层的磁体接头与外层的接头保护套构成，应用新兴导电胶连接简化装置制作工艺，其优势是依靠磁力与针灸针连接、闲置时便于存放且易于切换成工作状态、紧急情况下可迅速断开连接。
target: This joint consists of an inner magnet joint and an outer joint protection sleeve, which simplifies the manufacturing process due to conductive adhesive connection. This provides the advantage of a magnetic connection to the acupuncture needle, making it easy to store, able to idle, and capable of quickly disconnecting in the event of an emergency.

source: 接头与针灸针依靠磁力安全牢固连接，缩短操作时间，提高工作效率，有效解决目前鳄鱼夹接头存在的问题。
target: The joint and the acupuncture needle rely on magnetic forces to safely and firmly connect, thus shortening operation time, improving the working efficiency, and effectively solving the problems existing in the current crocodile clamp joint.

source: 口腔医学专业人员需要认知、学习和掌握人工智能技术，紧跟医疗新时代的步伐并在医疗实践中开展应用。
target: Stomatologists must recognize, learn, and master AI technologies to keep pace with a new era of healthcare and broaden AI applications in medical practice.

source: 人工智能是在电子计算机技术基础上迅速发展起来的科学技术，已应用于人类社会的许多方面，在医学领域的应用也越来越广泛，人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展和应用可在一定程度上引领口腔医学的未来。
target: Artificial intelligence is a science and technology that has developed rapidly with advances on electronic computer technology. It has been applied in many aspects of human society, and its use in the medical field is becoming more extensive. The development and application of artificial intelligence in the field of stomatology may help usher the field of dentistry into the future.

target_errors.term: usher the field of dentistry into the future

source: 本文就人工智能在口腔医疗、科研、教学中的应用及研究作一介绍，并对人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展进行展望。
target: This paper introduces the applications and research of artificial intelligence in stomatology, scientific research, and teaching, and provides an outlook for future development of artificial intelligence in stomatology.

target: In this case, researchers omitted outlier values before performing the analysis. It should be noted that the selection of omissions was based on subjective criteria, so different data adjustment methods will produce different results.

source: 本文采用虚拟和实际数据来阐述这个非常有用的处理 离散值的回归方法，并与采用经典回归模型和半参数 回归模型所得出的结果进行比较。
target: In this paper, both virtual and real data sets are used to depict this useful regression method of dealing with discrete values, and results are compared against those obtained by using conventional classical regression and semi-parametric regression models.

target: Linear regression models are widely used in research related to mental health and health services.

source: 通过分析主题内容确定了加强初级保健体系的备选方案。
target: Options for strengthening the primary healthcare system were identified via analysis of subject matter content.

source: 我们发现：(I) 尽管非传染性疾病负担日益沉重，但许多中低收入国家仍缺乏预防服务资金；(ii) 社区卫生工作者通常资源配备不足，无法获得良好的支持，并且缺乏相应培训；(iii) 在所研究的一半国家中，医疗自费超出卫生支出总额的 40％，不利于实现公平；(iv) 公共和私人体系分散、资金不足、腐败以及非正式员工参与不足，阻碍了健康保险计划的实施。
target: We found: (i) many low- and middle-income countries have insufficient funding for preventive services, despite the growing burden of non-communicable diseases; (ii) community health workers are often under-resourced, under-supported, and lack appropriate training; (iii) out-of-pocket payments for health care exceed 40% of total health expenditures in half of the countries studied, indicating inequitability; (iv) fragmented and underfunded public and private systems, corruption, and lack of informal worker participation hinder the implementation of health insurance institutions.

source: 一些国家权力下放，促使其初级保健分散。
target: In some countries, decentralization has contributed to the diffusion of primary healthcare.

source: 应该为初级卫生保健的决策制定提供充足的资源，并将政府在初级卫生保健方面的支出至少增加国内生产总值的 1％。
target: Adequate resources should be allocated for decision-making in primary healthcare, and government spending on primary healthcare should increase by at least 1% of GDP.

source: 初级卫生保健为实现全民健康覆盖 (UHC) 提供了一种经济有效的途径。
target: Primary healthcare provides a cost-effective path to universal health coverage (UHC).

source: 初级卫生保健为实现全民健康覆盖 (UHC) 提供了一种经济有效的途径。
target: Primary healthcare provides a cost-effective path to universal health coverage (UHC).

source: 然而在许多中低收入国家，初级卫生保健体系非常薄弱，常常无法提供全面的以人为本的综合保健。
target: In many low- and middle-income countries however, primary health care systems are inadequate and often fail to provide comprehensive, person-centered, integrated care.

source: 我们利用半扎根的研究方法分析了 20 个中低收入国家的初级卫生保健体系。
target: Using a semi-grounded research approach, we analyzed primary health care systems in 20 low- and middle-income countries.

source: 14 个国家中，私营部门基本上不受监管。
target: In 14 countries, the private sector is largely unregulated.

source: 此外，服务基本私有化的国家，社区很少参与初级卫生保健。
target: Moreover, in countries where services are largely privatized, communities are rarely involved in primary health care.

source: 当财政激励措施与法规和质量提升相结合，，并且社区参与度增强时，绩效便会有所改善。
target: Performance improves when financial incentives are combined with both regulatory and quality improvements, and when community engagement increases.

source: 多发性内分泌肿瘤-IIb型(multiple endocrine neoplasia type-IIb，MEN-IIb)是一种罕见的由RET基因突变引起的常染色体显性遗传病，具有特殊的临床表型，如黏膜神经瘤、类马方综合征体型、甲状腺髓样癌及嗜铬细胞瘤等。
target: Type-IIb multiple endocrine neoplasia (MEN-IIb) is a rare autosomal dominant disease caused by RET gene mutations that exhibits specific clinical phenotypes, such as mucosal neuroma, equinus syndrome body type, medullary thyroid cancer, and pheochromocytoma.

target_errors.term: equinus syndrome body type, medullary thyroid cancer

source: 2018年11月中南大学湘雅三医院收治了1例MEN-IIb患者，该患者自幼有舌黏膜神经瘤，曾因二尖瓣脱垂及脊柱畸形接受手术治疗，于22岁时被诊断为甲状腺髓样癌并接受手术治疗，但直至28岁发现嗜铬细胞瘤才临床诊断为MEN-IIb。
target: In November 2018, Xiangya San Hospital of Central South University admitted 1 patient with MEN-IIb with a lingual mucosal neuroma since childhood, a history of mitral valve prolapse and spinal deformity surgeries, and a diagnosis of thyroid myeloid cancer. This patient underwent surgical treatment at the age of 22, but was not clinically diagnosed with MEN-IIb until pheochromocytoma was discovered at the age of 28.

source: 临床医生对此病认识不足，诊断往往延迟。
target: Many clinicians are unfamiliar with the disorder, which often leads to delayed diagnosis.

source: 基因检测提示该患者携带一新发RET基因p.M918T杂合突变。
target: Genetic testing revealed that the patient is a carrier of a de novo p.M918T heterozygous mutation in the RET gene.

source: 在临床工作中早期识别内分泌系统以外的临床表现并进行RET基因筛查是早期诊断及治疗的关键。
target: In clinical practice, RET gene screening and early identification of clinical symptom manifestations outside the endocrine system are the key to early diagnosis and treatment.

source: 家庭成员间的紧密联系对青少年的幸福有着重要的影响，有助于他们的身体、心理和社会健康。
target: Close familial relationships can have a large impact on young people's well-being and contribute significantly to their physical, mental, and social health.

source: 本研究是一项长期性研究，考察了青少年认识的家庭成员间的紧密联系的过程，该过程预测了随着时间的推移，青少年有较多的积极健康行为和较少的消极健康行为。
target: This long-term study examines the process of close bonding between family members recognized by adolescents, predictive of eventual development of positive healthy adolescent behavior with a simultaneous decrease in negative adolescent behavior.

target_errors.term: predictive of eventual development of positive healthy adolescent behavior with a simultaneous decrease in negative adolescent behavior.

This long-term study examines the process of close bonding between family members recognized by adolescents, predictive of eventual development of positive healthy adolescent behavior with a simultaneous decrease in negative adolescent behavior.

source: 我们尤其是着力弄清楚适应性的和调适性不良的应对策略是否调和了家庭紧密性与青少年方面自我报告的健康状况之间的联系。
target: In particular, we are striving to clarify whether adaptive and maladjusted coping strategies can reconcile reported family togetherness with an adolescent's self-reported health conditions.

target_errors.term: In particular, we are striving to clarify whether adaptive and maladjusted coping strategies can reconcile reported family togetherness with an adolescent's self-reported health conditions.

source: 此研究的数据来自1774名10至17岁的新西兰青少年，他们一年一次完成3次自我报告问卷调查。
target: Data for this study was collected from 1,774 New Zealand adolescents aged 10 through 17 who completed a self-report questionnaire three times a year.

source: 通过使用纵向调解路径模型，我们测试了T2的适应不良和适应性应对策略是否在T1的家庭紧密性与在T3的总体健康、活力、睡眠充足、身体满意度、物质使用和自我伤害之间起调和作用。
target: Using a longitudinal mediation pathway model, we tested whether T2's maladaptive and adaptive coping strategies reconciled family cohesiveness at T1 by tracking overall health, vitality, adequate sleep, physical satisfaction, substance use, and self-harm at T3.

source: 研究结果表明，紧密的家庭关系预示着适应性应对能力的水平偏高，而适应性应对能力则预示着健康指标会提高，但疾病指标却没有下降。
target: The research findings showed that close family ties were predictive of higher levels of adaptive coping. Adaptive coping was predictive of an increase in health indicators; however there was no associated decrease in disease indicators.

target_errors.term: The research findings showed that close family ties were predictive of higher levels of adaptive coping. Adaptive coping was predictive of an increase in health indicators; however there was no associated decrease in disease indicators.

source: 此外，家庭成员间的紧密联系预示了面对压力挫折时的调适不良情况的降低，这反过来又预示了积极的健康结果水平更高和不良的健康结果偏少。
target: In addition, strong ties among family members predicted lower levels of maladjustment in the face of stressful situations, which in turn predicted more positive health outcomes and fewer adverse health outcomes.

source: 本研究的结果表明，家庭成员的紧密联系对青少年健康有积极影响，它是通过增加使用适应性应对策略，减少使用应对压力挫折时的不良调适策略，或两者兼而有之。
target: Findings from this study suggest that close family bonding positively impacts adolescent health by promoting adaptive coping strategies and/or reducing maladaptive coping strategies in response to stressful situations.

target_errors.term: Findings from this study suggest that close family bonding positively impacts adolescent health by promoting adaptive coping strategies and/or reducing maladaptive coping strategies in response to stressful situations.

source: 但是，人们对于这些作用的潜在机制知之甚少。
target: However, little is known about the underlying mechanisms of these effects.

source: 这些结果对于以青少年和父母为工作对象的临床治疗师以及开发促进健康计划的相关人员具有重要意义。
target: These results are significant to clinical therapists who work with adolescents and their parents, as well as those who develop public health promotion programs.

source: 但是，传统研究方法侧重于家庭和家庭之间在凝聚力和冲突方面的差异，通常会忽略某个具体家庭内部的日常变异性，而后者可能会提供重要的新信息。
target: However, traditional research methods that focus on differences in unity and conflict between families often neglect day-to-day behavior variability within a particular family, which may provide important new insights.

source: 本研究的参与者来自家中有两个照料者的家庭的照顾者共151名（女性占95.3％），以及他们的青春期孩子（女性占61.5％），我们使用的数据来自他们持续21天的每日记录中的数据，用以测试家庭功能的每日变化是否与青少年的幸福感的每日变化相关，以及青少年的幸福感是否取决于家庭功能的平均水平。
target: Participants in this study included 151 caregivers from families containing two caregivers (95.3% of whom were female) and their adolescent children (61.5% of whom were female). Data from self-reported 21-day daily logs identified whether daily changes in family functionality correlated with daily changes in adolescents' happiness, and whether adolescents' happiness were contingent upon the average level of family functionality.

source: 家庭层面的冲突和家庭的凝聚力是公认的衡量青少年心理健康的指标。
target: Family conflict and cohesion are widely recognized indicators of adolescent mental health.

source: 研究得出在凝聚力和冲突方面，每天都表现出有意义的变化。
target: The results of this study suggested that meaningful changes in familial unity and conflict can occur within a single day.

source: 我们采用多层次模型来研究家庭凝聚力和家庭冲突，他们与青少年生气，沮丧和焦虑情绪以及快乐，生活满意度以及生活中的意义和目的之间的相互关联。
target: A multilevel model was used to examine the correlations between family unity/conflict and adolescent anger, depression, anxiety, happiness, life satisfaction, and meaning or purpose in life.

source: 青少年报告的凝聚力和冲突与六个青春期结果之间有特殊的家庭内部的关联。
target: A specific intra-family correlation between adolescent-reported unity and conflict and the six adolescent outcomes was observed.

source: 使用父母方面报告的家庭功能数据的模型所产生的关联要少于使用青少年方面报告的数据的模型。
target: Models using parent reports of family functioning yielded fewer associations than models using adolescent reports.

source: 本研究还有几个发现。
target: There are additional findings from this study.

source: 跨层次的交互作用表明，家庭内的凝聚力差异仅与生活在家庭内聚力平均水平以下的家庭的青少年抑郁有关。
target: Cross-level interactions showed that differences in unity within families were only associated with depression among adolescents living in households with below-average levels of unity within families.

source: 总而言之，这项研究提供了令人信服的证据，表明家庭生活每天都会表现出有意义的差异性，而且每日的差异都会对青少年的幸福感具有重要的影响。
target: In review, this study provides compelling evidence that family environments can undergo significant changes on a daily basis, and that these daily differences can majorly impact an adolescent's well-being.

source: 成人朗格汉斯组织细胞增多症患者的临床实验特征以及影响预后的因素分析. 观察分析成人朗格汉斯组织细胞增生症（LCH）患者的临床实验特征及预后因素. 回顾性分析2010年1月至2019年8月就诊于本院且经组织病理学确诊的成人LCH患者38例的临床特征和实验室检查特征，并对患者的临床预后进行深入分析. 38例LCH患者中位年龄为41（21-65岁）岁，男女比约为2∶1。
target: Clinical experimental characteristics of adult patients with Langerhans histiocytosis and analysis of factors affecting prognosis. Observational analysis of clinical characteristics and prognostic factors of adult patients with Langerhans histiocytosis (LCH). The clinical and laboratory features of 38 adult LCH patients diagnosed by this hospital's histopathology department from January 2010 to August 2019 were retrospectively analyzed, and the clinical prognosis of patients was analyzed in depth. The median age of the 38 LCH patients (ranging 21-65 years) was 41 years, and the male-to-female ratio was approximately 2:1.

target_errors.term: Clinical experimental characteristics of adult patients with Langerhans histiocytosis and analysis of factors affecting prognosis.
diagnosed by this hospital's histopathology department
Observational analysis of clinical characteristics and prognostic factors of adult patients with Langerhans histiocytosis (LCH).

source: 38例LCH患者中，出现多系统累及占44.7%，31.6%的患者具有危险器官(肝脏、肺、造血系统或脾脏)累及，最常见受累器官为骨骼（21/38，55.3%），最常见的临床症状为疼痛（19/38，50.0%）。
target: Of the 38 patients with LCH, multisystem involvement was present in 44.7% of subjects, while 31.6% had some type of organ (liver, lung, hematopoietic system or spleen) involvement. The most commonly involved organ was bone (21/38, 55.3%), and the most common clinical symptom was pain (19/38, 50.0%).

source: 实验室检查显示，贫血、血小板减少、中性粒细胞减少、淋巴细胞减少、单核细胞增多、C反应蛋白升高、血沉升高以及铁蛋白升高的发生率分别为10.5%、2.6%、5.3%、15.8%、28.9%、28.6%（6/21）、55.3%（10/18）及55.3%（9/17）。
target: Laboratory tests showed that the prevalence of anemia, thrombocytopenia, neutropenia, lymphopenia, monocytosis, elevated C-reactive protein, elevated hematocrit, and elevated ferritin in the subjects was 10.5%, 2.6%, 5.3%, 15.8%, 28.9%, 28.6% (6/21), 55.3% (10/18), and 55.3% (9/17), respectively.

source: 中位随访时间为53个月，共5例患者死亡。

target: Clinical experimental characteristics of adult patients with Langerhans histiocytosis and analysis of factors affecting prognosis. Observational analysis of clinical characteristics and prognostic factors of adult patients with Langerhans histiocytosis (LCH). source: 无危险器官受累患者的预后显著优于有危险器官受累的患者，患者10年OS率分别为100%和60.6%（P=0.0007）。
target: The prognoses of patients without organ involvement was significantly better compared to those of patients with organ involvement, with 10-year OS rates of 100% and 60.6% of patients, respectively (P=0.0007).

source: 进一步分析发现，除多系统受累与危险器官受累为不良预后因素外，初诊时外周血单核细胞增多以及铁蛋白升高与较差的预后显著相关. 多系统受累与危险器官受累、初诊时外周血单核细胞增多以及铁蛋白升高是成人LCH患者重要的预后不良因素。
target: Further analysis found that peripheral increase of blood-level mononuclear cells and ferritin, in addition to multi-system and organ involvement, were significantly associated with poor prognosis at the first diagnosis. Multi-system involvement and involvement of organs, peripheral increase of blood-level mononuclear cells at initial diagnosis, and elevated ferritin are significant prognostic factors for adult patients with LCH.

source: 长期摄入大量乙醇导致肠源性内毒素血症，活性氧、高浓度的三磷酸腺苷及尿酸激活焦亡系统，进而通过切割Gasdermin-D打孔机制导致肝细胞死亡，同时伴有白细胞介素-1β、白细胞介素-18等炎性因子的释放。
target: Ingestion of large amounts of ethanol leads to chronic enterogenic endotoxemia. Reactive oxygen species and high concentrations of adenosine triphosphate and uric acid activate the pyroptosis system, which in turn leads to hepatocyte cell death through the cleavage of the Gasdermin-D perforation mechanism accompanied by the release of inflammatory factors such as interleukin-1β and interleukin-18.

source: 这一系列的过程激活免疫系统，介导级联炎症反应，促进酒精性肝病从脂肪变性到炎症、纤维化的进展。
target: This series of processes activates the immune system and mediates a cascade of inflammatory responses that can promote the progression of alcoholic liver disease from steatosis to inflammation and fibrosis.

source: 研究多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者骨髓中结缔组织生长因子（CTGF）水平及其与骨髓瘤溶骨性病变的关系，探讨CTGF在多发性骨髓瘤骨病中的临床意义。
target: To investigate the level of connective tissue growth factors (CTGF) present in the bone marrow of patients with multiple myeloma (MM), to investigate the relationship of CTGF levels to myeloma osteolytic lesions, and to explore the clinical significance of CTGF in multiple myeloma osteopathy.

source: 选取2019年3月-2020年4月在本院接受治疗的MM患者54例，同时选取28例健康志愿者作为对照组，收集受试者骨髓后分离骨髓上清，采用双抗体夹心酶标免疫分析法（ELISA）检测骨髓上清液中CTGF蛋白表达水平，分析其与临床相关指标之间的关系. MM患者的CTGF水平显著高于健康对照组 （P<0.001）；男性患者CTGF水平明显高于女性患者（P=0.007）；有骨病组的MM患者CTGF水平明显高于无骨病组的患者和对照组（P=0.007，P=0.001）。
target: A total of 54 MM patients who received treatment in our hospital from March 2019 to April 2020 were selected, with 28 healthy volunteers were selected to be part of the control group. The bone marrow supernatant was isolated from collected patient bone marrow. Expressed levels of CTGF protein in the bone marrow supernatant was detected via a double antibody sandwich enzyme-labeled immunoassay (ELISA), and the relationship between these levels and clinically related indicators were analyzed. The CTGF level in MM patients was significantly higher than that in the healthy control (P<0.001). The level of CTGF in male patients was significantly higher than that of female patients (P=0.007). The CTGF level of MM patients in the osteopathic group was significantly higher than that of the osteopathic group and the control group (P=0.007, P=0.001).

target: Compared to high-income couples, low-income couples exhibit a much higher rate of relationship breakdown. The breakdown of a couple's relationship is defined by divorce and/or separation from a cohabiting partner.

target: Recognizing that relationship interventions can make a difference in relationship outcomes, these measures are increasingly used when applicable.

source: 面向低收入伴侣的关系干预措施要想有效且能对其需求有针对性回应,就需要描述类的数据,这些数据能反映这些伴侣自己如何看待他们关系出现的问题,以及和高收入的伴侣使用的代表性的干预措施比起来,他们如何评估他们自己的需要。

source: 结果表明低收入伴侣寻求关系干预时,关系经历着更高水平的痛苦(较低的关系满意度、主要关系问题更严重、关系稳定性也较差),整个生活境况也出现更高水平的紧张程度 (更多孩子在家生活、更不可能有全职的工作、健康状态堪忧)。
target: The results showed that when low-income couples sought relationship intervention, their relationships experienced higher levels of distress (lower relationship satisfaction, more serious major relationship problems, and poorer relationship stability) and higher levels of tension in their overall life situations (more children living at home, lower rates of full-time employment, and poor health).

source: 结果表明在未来开发设计的干预措施应该着眼于低收入伴侣的需求,那些治疗低收入伴侣的医师也都要有准备去处理更高水平的关系紧张程度,导致他们生活环境紧张的多重因素,而这些是平日治疗更富足的伴侣时不常见的。
target: The results suggest that future interventions should be tailored to the needs of low-income couples, and that physicians treating low-income couples should be prepared to deal with multiple stressors and higher levels of relationship tension that may not be present in more affluent couples.

source: 本研究的样本来自网上招募的5,000个个体,他们在网上寻求关系干预,他们也比较低收入伴侣和较高收入伴侣这两类人群的关系状况和生活状况。
target: The study sampled 5,000 individuals who sought relationship interventions online, and compared the relationship and living conditions of the two groups of low-income couples to higher-income couples.

source: 然而,这些干预对低收入伴侣的关系的影响却非常有限。
target: However, the impact of these interventions on the relationships of low-income couples was very limited.

source: 长期摄入大量乙醇导致肠源性内毒素血症，活性氧、高浓度的三磷酸腺苷及尿酸激活焦亡系统，进而通过切割Gasdermin-D打孔机制导致肝细胞死亡，同时伴有白细胞介素-1β、白细胞介素-18等炎性因子的释放。
target: Ingestion of large amounts of ethanol leads to chronic enterogenic endotoxemia. Reactive oxygen species and high concentrations of adenosine triphosphate and uric acid activate the pyroptosis system, which in turn leads to hepatocyte cell death through the cleavage of the Gasdermin-D perforation mechanism accompanied by the release of inflammatory factors such as interleukin-1β and interleukin-18.

source: 这一系列的过程激活免疫系统，介导级联炎症反应，促进酒精性肝病从脂肪变性到炎症、纤维化的进展。
target: This series of processes activates the immune system and mediates a cascade of inflammatory responses that can promote the progression of alcoholic liver disease from steatosis to inflammation and fibrosis.

source: 含利妥昔单抗化疗方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤致急性肺损伤患者26例临床分析. 通过总结分析弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（DLBCL）患者应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤的临床特点、治疗及预后，提高对该病的认识并指导临床治疗。
target: A clinical analysis of 26 patients who underwent rituximab chemotherapy to treat diffuse large B-cell lymphoma-related acute lung injury was performed. The study summarized and analyzed the clinical characteristics, treatment, and prognosis of patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma DLBCL who developed acute lung injury after undergoing a rituximab-containing chemotherapy treatment in an effort to improve understanding of the disease and guide clinical treatment.

target_errors.term: A clinical analysis of 26 patients who underwent rituximab chemotherapy to treat diffuse large B-cell lymphoma-related acute lung injury was performed.

The study summarized and analyzed the clinical characteristics, treatment, and prognosis of patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma DLBCL who developed acute lung injury after undergoing a rituximab-containing chemotherapy treatment in an effort to improve understanding of the disease and guide clinical treatment.

source: 选择本院2013年1月至2018年9月收治的26例应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案并出现急性肺损伤的DLBCL患者，对其临床特征、影像学表现、化疗疗程、治疗效果及预后进行分析。
target: 26 patients with DLBCL undergoing rituximab-containing chemotherapy treatments for acute lung injury were admitted to our hospital from January 2013 to September 2018. The subjects' clinical characteristics, imaging findings, chemotherapy course, treatment response, and prognosis were analyzed as part of the study.

source: 患者主要临床症状为发热、咳嗽及胸闷; 其中12例患者低氧血症, 3例患者I型呼吸衰竭; 胸部CT以双肺弥漫性磨玻璃影为主要表现，部分患者合并少量胸腔积液; 发病时间主要分布在2-4个疗程, 症状出现距方案中利妥昔单抗输注时间在8-49 d; 25例患者治疗有效后日常生活无明显受限, 1例患者治疗无效死亡。
target: Major clinical symptoms of the patients included pyrexia, cough, and chest tightness. Twelve patients had hypoxemia and three patients had Type I respiratory failure. Chest CT images showed diffuse "ground glass" opacities in both lungs, as well as minor pleural effusion in certain patients lungs. The onset time ranged between the second and fourth courses, and the duration of rituximab infusion in the protocol was 8 to 49 days. Following treatment, 25 patients survived and were able to resume daily activities unrestricted, while one patient died.

target_errors.term: as well as minor pleural effusion in certain patients lungs.

source: 弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤早期无典型临床症状, 早期发现及早期激素治疗对取得良好治疗效果至关重要。
target: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma treated with rituximab-containing chemotherapy may display an unusual presentation differing from the typical early clinical symptoms of acute lung injury. Early detection and hormone therapy intervention are critical to achieving good therapeutic outcomes.

target_errors.term: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma treated with rituximab-containing chemotherapy may display an unusual presentation differing from the typical early clinical symptoms of acute lung injury.

source: 然而，经典线性回归分析是假设该数据 为正态分布的，但是很多研究所获得的数据并不符合 这种假设。
target: However, classical linear regression analysis assumes that the data is normally distributed, but the data obtained in many studies do not conform to this assumption.

source: 但是，半参数模型对离散 数据相当敏感，因此在处理包含离散值的数据时产生 的估计值是不可靠的。
target: However, as the semi-parametric model is highly sensitive to discrete data, the estimator may be unreliable when dealing with data containing discrete values.

source: 在这种情况下，一些研究者在 删减这些极端值后再进行分析，但是，删减数据的事 先法则（ad-hoc rules）是基于主观标准的，所以不同 的调整方法就会产生不同的结果。
target: In this case, researchers omitted outlier values before performing the analysis. It should be noted that the selection of omissions was based on subjective criteria, so different data adjustment methods will produce different results.

source: 等级回归为处理包 括离散值的非正态分布数据提供了更为客观的方法。
target: Rank regression provides a more objective approach to visualizing non-normally distributed data that includes discrete values.

source: 本文采用虚拟和实际数据来阐述这个非常有用的处理 离散值的回归方法，并与采用经典回归模型和半参数 回归模型所得出的结果进行比较。
target: In this paper, both virtual and real data sets are used to depict this useful regression method of dealing with discrete values, and results are compared against those obtained by using conventional classical regression and semi-parametric regression models.

source: 线性回归模型被广泛应用于精神卫生和卫生服 务相关研究。
target: Linear regression models are widely used in research related to mental health and health services.

source: 解决该问题的方法之一是采用不要求数据 为正态分布的半参数模型。
target: One way to address this problem is to use a semi-parametric model that does not require normally distributed data.

source: 直接抗病毒药物（DAAs），是治疗慢性乙型肝炎的重要手段。
target: Direct antiviral agents (DAAs) are well-established treatments for chronic hepatitis B.

source: DAAs能直接干扰病毒的感染复制过程，减少子代病毒产率，继而影响体内乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）的两种动态平衡，即肝细胞中病毒复制-循环中病毒衰减之间的平衡，共价闭合环状DNA（cccDNA）池补充-cccDNA衰减之间的平衡。
target: DAAs can directly interfere with viral replication process and reduce yield of viral progeny. This affects the stability of hepatitis B virus (HBV) in vivo by namely disrupting the balance between viral replication in hepatocytes and viral attenuation in circulation, as well as the balance between the covalent closed loop DNA (cccDNA) pool supplementation and cccDNA attenuation.

source: 因此，靶向HBV感染复制的不同环节，开发新型DAAs十分必要。
target: Therefore, it is necessary to develop novel DAAs that target different features of the HBV infection replication process.

source: 现有核苷（酸）类似物足以影响第一种平衡，却难以撼动第二种平衡。
target: Though existing nucleoside (acid) analogs can be sufficient to unbalance the former pathway, the latter pathway is more difficult to unbalance.

target_errors.term: the latter pathway is more difficult to unbalance

source: 现从cccDNA池补充-cccDNA衰减这一平衡的两个方面，探讨近期DAAs研发的主要进展。
target: The main recent advances in the development of DAAs are discussed in the context of the cccDNA pool replenishment/decay equilibrium.

target_errors.term: in the context of the cccDNA pool replenishment/decay equilibrium
